img_summary: The image depicts the **Tiger Subduing Pellets**, an uncommon item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item, when used, moderately increases damage for a long duration. It can be found in a case on a cliff after defeating Lingxuzi in Bamboo Grove, near the Snake Trail Shrine in Black Wind Mountain, or purchased from Xu Dog in Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar in Yellow Wind Ridge. Crafting it requires **1 Snake-Head Mushroom** and **1 Purple Lingzhi**.
